ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Kunark: first impressions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... proportional to ... spans at ... secondary ... reavers. ... be sure ... stuff occupied ... Ok, the number of reavers isn t proportional to the number of
ygData.messageBody:
> City of Mist information
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
> It appears that the number of reaver spawns in the City of Mist is
proportional to
> the number of groups either fighting it or the people in zone. The Lord
spans at
> the end of the string of reavers. What got me the other night was the
secondary
> mobs which popped or wandered in while we dealt with the string of
reavers.
> Wouldn't have been a problem but our cleric also went link dead. Even so,
be sure
> to allocate tanks or pets or enchanters or bards to keeping the other
stuff occupied
> or messed. The yard trash hits mighty hard ;P.

Ok, the number of reavers isn't proportional to the number of groups as far
as we've been able to tell on Saryn. So far we've gone with 4 groups twice
and gotten 2 reavers once and 1 reaver the other time. Hardly anyone does
CoM right now, they're all in Karnor's ;) So I'm reasonably sure that the
number of Reavers isn't affected by the number of groups in the zone. To be
honest I dont see how the code could support something like this anyway.

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath - Saryn Server
